description: Describes the permissions that the owner of a connection alias has granted to another Amazon Web Services account for the specified connection alias. For more information, see Cross-Region Redirection for Amazon WorkSpaces.

parameters.name: AliasId
parameters.description: The identifier of the connection alias.

nested_items.name: AliasId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the connection alias.

nested_items.name: ConnectionAliasPermissions
nested_items.description: The permissions associated with a connection alias.

nested_items.name: SharedAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that the connection alias is shared with.

nested_items.name: AllowAssociation
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the specified Amazon Web Services account is allowed to associate the connection alias with a directory.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
